group_1.narration: My birthplace. A part of Kamihama that's@been treated like a burden since olden times.

group_1.textRight: I heard the young woman next door and the guy@her parents chose for her called it quits.

group_1.textLeft: You're kidding! I thought it was going @really well!
(Those two never get tired of gossiping@about what's going on in the neighborhood.)

group_1.textRight: His parents gave their permission already...
But apparently his grandfather butted in and@revoked it!

group_1.textLeft: Ah, that guy's grandfather is from Mizuna,@isn't that right?

group_1.textRight: Right, right! And you know, those prejudices@are pretty deeply ingrained...
Well... It goes back to before even your@mother or I were born.
Daito and Mizuna... A lot happened between@the East and West.
Places like Shinsei and Minaminagi, where@your school is, have developed and changed...
But Daito and Mizuna haven't changed much,@and they still can't get over it.
I guess no one your age would understand.@Things have come a long way since then.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah... I donâ€™t really know the details.

group_1.textRight: Ha ha ha, I'm not surprised!
But it's not something that'll go away @completely.
At least not while the older generation is@still around.

group_1.textLeft: (Stuff that happened between the East and@West... Might as well look into it later.)

group_1.narration: My parents love gossip like this, but @they're also light-hearted, so I had little@exposure to problems of this nature.
I think it's also because of my school,@Minaminagi Liberty Academy.@It's a very open, international school.

group_1.textRight: Dear me, look what time it is! If you don't@head out now, you'll be late!

group_1.narration: There's one more thing I@should mention about myself.

group_1.textCenter: I can't believe it... That's an albino@dolphin!

group_1.narration: I run into all kinds of rare things you'd@never expect to really happen.

group_1.textCenter: I gotta tell everyone at school about this!

group_1.narration: "A rainbow cloud? Come off it."@"You're always joking around like that!"@"Ryo loves being the center of attention."@"She lays it on so thick with her stories!"

group_1.textCenter: (They'd probably just think I was making it@up again.)

group_1.narration: That's how my pre-Magical Girl days were like...
I'd come across all kinds of outrageous@stuff, but no one ever believed me.
I was a pretty normal girl other than that.
